verbose_text: Supportive findings from in vitro assays purport the concept that NG2 / CSPG4 may affect drug sensitivity of cancer cells by reinforcing their interactions with the host microenvironment, especially with the stromal ECM, by modulating the activity of certain integrins and, through these actions, by activating pro survival signalling cascades XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
evidence: ECM, by modulating the activity of certain integrins
